{"name": "Faith Memorial Baptist Church Summer Meals ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "No service on 7/3/2025 and 7/4/2025
this summer from 06-16-2025 to 07-25-2025.
All kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.
Some meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals
Families can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers. Learn more and find out if your child is eligible at ncdhhs.gov/SUNBucks.
The supervisor is Lawanda Williams  (tel: (704) 449-6475).  ", "email": "", "url": "https://summermeals4nckids.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "211 Lakewood Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Lakewood", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28208", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2555578, "longitude": -80.8771313}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 449-6475", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:15"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
